headline: GTA Online
subtitle: On the Podium this Week: Albany V-STR
content:
Whether youâ€™re waking up in the Penthouse, paying the slots a visit, or pre-gaming before hitting The Music Locker, the lobby of The Diamond Casino & Resort is a must-visit for any discerning Los Santos citizen. Spin the Lucky Wheel once daily to walk away with GTA$, RP, clothing, mystery prizes and more.

This week on the podium is the Albany V-STR, a luxury sedan that might as well hermetically seal you off from the 99%.
